name: Hunter Project: Operation Survive
description:
Storyline

In the year 3035, an Alien empire invaded Earth after Earth had a conflict between two governments. Humanity retreated to a planet called Typhon as a way to escape the Alien's wrath. The Aliens, after the invasion, unknowingly dropped parasites of unknown origin onto Earth, causing the parasite to begin reproducing and expanding. The human government began to study the parasite and its behavior by creating a dedicated research facility named the "Pandora's Box." After a few years of the research facility's creation, the facility had gotten overrun by the infection and was abandoned. The military formed a special military branch called the Cleaner Containment Regiment. Assigned to do tasks on Earth such as recovering data, studying parasite behaviors, finding survivors, etc. Cleaner 1.5.9. was one of many that dropped on Earth with the sole purpose of wiping out the infection so humanity can rebuild Earth from the damage the Aliens created.

Hunter Project: Operation Survive is a top-down action shooter that puts you in the shoes of an agent tasked to go to Earth and make a dent in the infestation called the "Hive". Your team is dead and you are now alone, abandoned by command.

Key Features

  • Story
    Play as an Agent trying to make ends meet with his team and a couple of survivors
  • Survival
    The Hive population is unknown hence you are destined to fail. Survive as long as you can.
  • Expeditions
    Go with a team in a vast and open field, complete tasks while fighting a rogue organization and the infection while encountering survivors.
  • Watch your health!
    The Hive will constantly attack you and you must keep an eye on your vitals.
  • Unique maps
    Go from science labs to cities, and play through big open areas to either survive or explore.
  • interact with survivors on Earth
    Find and meet survivors on Earth, with your uniform, they will either help you... or fight you.
  • Weapons of choice
    Use different weapons to fight the horde of zombies and hope you don't run out of ammo.
